website_summaries.verdict: Comfort, ease of use and strong harness straps make this a great safety harness for its sub-$100 price point.
pros: Easy to put on and adjust, with comfortable padding at the shoulders and hips
A tool belt can be fastened around the waist pad
cons: Padding can be hot and uncomfortable
Harness can slide out of position when not under load

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely excellent quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing! I'm a ham radio operator and I wanted to get into climbing towers. All the guys in my club paid $100's of dollars for their equipment and when they saw what I bought for the money, they were impressed. So much so, that I'm fairly sure I've sold a couple more of these just by default. GREAT harness. Also, being a small woman, I bought the small. Fits perfectly. I'm looking forward to using this thing for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: This harness is the perfect affordable harness for any type of wear
customer_reviews.text: This harness is the perfect affordable harness for any type of wear. We use it for our guys with our solar company and the front hooks make it a breeze for wear. I’d definitely recommend for its functionality, comfort, and durability. Not to mention the larger company I subcontract for now purchases this specific harness for all of their employees.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable an light
customer_reviews.text: Not the red color i ordered but really really happy that it came in this color. It fits super comfortable an im overall super estatic with it. Looking forward to buying another just like it
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne B.

customer_reviews.title: A Smart Investment
customer_reviews.text: (account holders boyfriend/Iron Worker) Absolutely amazing. Everyday coming home with bruised hips or just pain in general was getting old. I purchased this and I cannot express enough how much it helps. Great price and will 100% get rid of the agrivation of having to wear a belt (by distributing the weight evenly on your shoulders/hips when adjusted) and my belt weighs over 30lbs easy! You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O'Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear, while maintaining safety on the job.
customer_reviews.text: Quality constructed. You feel safe and comfortable wearing this safety harness. The product is excellent. The buckles, the straps, the stitching are all high quality. If asked about this harness, I recommend this product without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K Inouye

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is not meant to be worn all day. The shoulder straps slide up and down throughout the day and dig into your shoulders. This is cheap and will get you by.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how the company is even able to make the harness for this price. It seems very well made and is much safer for tree work than the 20 year old rock climbing harness that I was using. And FWIW, I'm 5'10" and 155 lb and the small size harness has room in both directions.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Good manly gear
customer_reviews.text: Used to trim trees with lift up 40' in the air. Luckily, didn't "need" it. But it was fairly comfortable and easy to put on. I'm 6'3" 240#. Be smart, use one if you are on a lift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harness

customer_reviews.title: ... safe on a steep roof thirty feet up and comfortable to wear and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Kept me safe on a steep roof thirty feet up and comfortable to wear and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Great harness easy to get on and off well worth the coins
customer_reviews.author: DANZ

customer_reviews.title: Adds some confidence
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and tight. And adjusts well. Also give a boost of safety confidence.
customer_reviews.author: German Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, and more comfortable than previous harnesses I've worn. Good harness for the money!
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Our crews love these hardnesses. They're much more comfortable than other brands, for the same price or less. The shoulder pads offer real protection, and the connection rings on the sides give us the versatility we need to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable harness. Spend hours in it
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable harness. Spend hours in it. make a rope bridge across the hip D rings to allow easier work positioning with a single line and caribiner.
customer_reviews.author: Fueltime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price...it's very comfy Thanks Amazon for this product very affordable and good quality harness.
customer_reviews.author: Richie503

customer_reviews.title: best deal for a full body harness.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, good quality and very good value. I compare this harness to others priced two and three times more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality harness
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality harness. Fits very well, would recommend to all who use this type of equipment for work.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good ships fast perfect for my job as a millwright
customer_reviews.author: millwright

customer_reviews.title: Best damn product
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this product I've gotten more use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort and safety
customer_reviews.text: hard to match the amount of safety provided for the cost... comfort and safety combined with a very reasonable price, thanks...
customer_reviews.author: mike j. sklenar

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light weight harness for a fantastic price. It fits work belts like a glove, I would recommend this for anyone in a trade that requires harnesses. I bought 2 myself
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Edwards

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: excelent quality, very good recommend but had a single problem, the size was a little tight need to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: EDER FARES ANTOUN

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best harnesses that I have used. Fits well and works easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jammie J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best harness I've came across. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: diamond

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Grade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! This was under $100 and the guys on the job are mad because it is the same as their $400 ones! Haven't fallen off a bridge yet but I would recommend this set to anyone! Buy this one!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... stiff and the back support material is not the best but for the price it is
customer_reviews.text: Kind of stiff and the back support material is not the best but for the price it is okay
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, easy on and off, comfortable to work in
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Seems comefortable enough to work all day in, if needed
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once, 30' up inside a chimney chase that needed framing repairs. Well worth it for the peace of mind (and wife's).
customer_reviews.author: M. Zinn

product_meta.title: 3M Protecta PRO Construction Harness, Back and Side D-Rings, 420 lb. Capacity, Medium/Large, 1191209
product_meta.description:
Size:Medium / Large| Color:RedWith designs that incorporates improved fit, updated colors, and durable yet lightweight construction, PRO harnesses provide greater comfort and added safety — which translates to reduced worker fatigue and increased productivity. Protecta has many of the same features as higher priced equipment, such as ergonomic design, impact indicators, serial numbers, steel hardware and options for specialized needs and budgets. Go with PRO gear incorporating exceptional performance and value - compliance has never been so easy or economical!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For more than 70 years, we have earned the trust of companies and people around the world by putting all our energy and all our expertise into achieving our mission: Dedicated to bringing every worker at height home safely.
feature_bullets: BACK D-RING: Provides a safe connection point for your fall arrest system, and keeps you upright after a fall for added safety.
TOOL AND EQUIPMENT RINGS: Four equipment rings provide easy access to extra tools and gear.
SHOULDER PADS: Helps disburse weight over wider area of shoulders for added comfort.
DURABLE POLYSTER WEB CONSTRUCTION: Lightweight and extremely strong polyester webbing provides ultimate durability and longevity.
IMPACT INDICATOR: Rip-stitch indicators allow you to inspect the harness at a glance, for prior damaging impact loads.
PARACHUTE TORSO ADJUSTERS: Completes the 5-point adjustment system for a perfect fit.
Pro harnesses have a ergonomically designed chassis for better fit and function
Back dee ring for fall protection and side dee rings for positioning
Tongue buckle leg straps for secure and easy donning
Integrated hip pad and shoulder pads for the ultimate in comfort
Tongue buckle body belt and side dee rings for added comfort and support when positioning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
